name: seller1_email_fsbo
title: What is the email address of the first seller signer?
label: Seller Email
description: This is where we will send the agreement for review and to gather signatures from all the other seller signers.
tips: Be sure this is an email address that the seller signer checks regularly as this will be used for important document delivery and communications.
small_print: The first seller signer will be responsible for forwarding the agreement Docusign to all other seller signers.

seller1_email_fsbo.name: seller1_email_fsbo
seller1_email_fsbo.tooltip: Enter the first seller signer's email address
